questions.question: What is the main purpose of reading comprehension?
questions.explanation: Reading comprehension is about understanding and interpreting the meaning of text, not just memorizing facts or reading quickly.

questions.question: Which of the following is a good reading strategy?

choices.D: Reading only the first sentence of each paragraph

questions.explanation: Taking notes while reading helps you engage with the material and remember key points.

questions.question: What does 'context clues' refer to in reading?

choices.A: The font size of the text
choices.B: Hints in the surrounding text that help understand unknown words

questions.explanation: Context clues are hints found in the surrounding text that help readers understand the meaning of unfamiliar words.

questions.question: Why is it important to preview a text before reading?

choices.A: To avoid reading the whole text
choices.B: To get an overview and activate prior knowledge

questions.explanation: Previewing helps readers get an overview of the content and activate their prior knowledge about the topic.
